Legally - you cant, unless it’s your own phone-call ! Legally - you have to tell the other person the call is being recorded - to give them the ‘informed option’ of terminating the call or not. If you just record calls without telling the other person, and you rely on information from that call in court - it can’t be used in evidence, because the other person was not aware they were being recorded.
